price: Izuba ntirishobora guhurirana n’ukwezi cyangwa ngo ijoro rize mu mwanya w’amanywa. Kandi byose byogoga mu myanya yabyo.
arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā al-shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tud'rika al-qamara walā al-laylu sābiqu al-nahāri wakullun fī falakin yasbaḥūna
